Function Documentation

COPSmessage& operator+ (  COPSmessage &  c,
const COPSObj &  obj
) 
 

Provides the means to incrementaly associate COPS Objects to a COPS message Example: 

                        COPSmessage msg;
                        COPSCommonHeader hdr;
                        COPSHandle hdl;
                        COPSContext cont;
                        msg+hdr+hdl+cont;
Parameters:
c COPSmessage to which the Objects will be appended
obj COPSObject to be appended

COPSmessage& operator+ (  COPSmessage &  c,
const COPSCommonHeader &  h
) 
 

This operator provides the means to create a message by "+" to the COPSmessage

std::ostream& operator<< (  std::ostream &  o,
const COPSmessage &  cops
) 
 

Socket& operator<< (  Socket &  socket,
const COPSmessage &  m
) 
 

Will send to a previously create TCP socket the COPS message Example: 

                        Socket s;
                        COPSmessage m;
                        s << m;
Parameters:
socket TCP socket
m COPSmessage fully constructed (contains header plus objects)

Socket& operator>> (  Socket &  socket,
COPSmessage &  m
) 
 

Will receive from a previously create TCP socket the COPS message. Please note that this is a blocking function, it will block until a COPSmessage is received (valid or not) Example: 

                        Socket s;
                        COPSmessage m;
                        s >> m;
Parameters:
socket TCP socket
m COPSmessage as retrieved from network
